item.title: Foxdot
item.description: FoxDot Ac√° va un tutorial re piola sobre FoxDot.

item.title: Flok: Collaborative Live Coding Platform
item.description: @plabarta_ and me helped to implement FoxDot on Flok, an amazing tool developed by munshkr which allows you to live code music and visuals online in a collaborative way. You can check the instructions on the official repository. Here is a short video demonstration of us using it with FoxDot and some hydra visuals.

item.title: Scraping drum patterns from PDF
item.description: Big collection of digitalized drum patterns

item.title: Audio Reactive Slime
item.description: A slime mold simulation made by nicoptere and modified by solquemal and me for audio reactivity. Run the interactive demo here. It works better on Firefox. Inspired by this amazing work. Implemented from this paper You can check a sample of this here.

item.title: bu3nAmigue - Experimental Indie Band
item.description: On december 2019, solquemal, pablito and me formed bu3nAmigue, an artistic collective focused on live coding. You can check our social networks here: Instagram bandcamp YouTube GitHub
